structure.unit: TITLE TO PROPERTY AND RESTRICTIONS ON USE, OWNERSHIP, AND ALIENATION

law.history: Repealed 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 25, sec. 118, effective July 15, 2014. -- Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 59, sec. 7, effective July 12, 2012. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 220, sec. 1, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 386, sec. 69. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 61, sec. 1. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2355.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Estates in trust subject to debts of beneficiary -- Spendthrift trusts excepted -- Other exceptions.
